list_definition.definition: a set of rungs or steps between two long supports, for climbing up or down

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She was standing on a ladder, painting the ceiling

list_definition.mean_english: lỗi trong chiếc bít tất do đan
list_definition.definition: a long, narrow flaw caused by the breaking of a stitch in a stocking or other knitted fabric; run American

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’ve got a ladder in my stocking.

list_definition.definition: to (cause to) develop such a flaw

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I laddered my best pair of tights today
